title: My Future Listography: All I Hope to Do in Lists
description: FOR THE Now fans of our Listography journals (over a million copies sold!) can list all their hopes and dreams with My Future Listography . Encouraging users to envision future goals and aspirations, this journal includes over 70 all-new thought-provoking list topics that range from the practical (museums to visit, hobbies to try, things you aspire to be fearless at) to the more thoughtful (what you hope people say at your funeral, experiences you would love to have again). With quirky hand-drawn illustrations and insightful prompts throughout, this journal invites the motivation and fun that come with pondering the road ahead. Perfect for planners, list-lovers, and dreamers of all ages! Check out the entire Listography Series, Date Night In, The Listography Boardgame, and more below!
author: Lisa Nola
